about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn more about my background, skills and interests
about.bio: I am a software engineer and researcher with a focus on autonomous vehicles and intelligent systems. With a background in Computer Science, I combine theoretical knowledge with practical implementation to develop solutions for complex problems. My work sits at the intersection of software engineering, artificial intelligence, and robotics.
about.bioExtended: Throughout my academic and professional journey, I've been dedicated to advancing the field of autonomous vehicles. My research contributes to making transportation safer, more efficient, and more accessible for everyone. I believe in the power of technology to transform our world for the better.
